title.rendered: NEW Virtual Career Fair Launch Kit

content.rendered:
We’re excited to announce the launch of our new Virtual Career Fair Launch Kit!

This kit is a collection of resources to help career center partners prepare for and kick off their Handshake virtual career fair. You’ll find:

  • Resources organized into pre-, during-, and post-fair
  • NEW virtual fair checklist for career services
  • NEW webinars & recordings
  • NEW employer playbook
Visit the Virtual Career Fair Launch Kit

excerpt.rendered: Leverage special content, training, recordings, and more to plan, promote, and launch your virtual career fair.
